decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (010 Rev. P2, 020 Rev. P2, 030 Rev. P2, 031 Rev. P2, 050 Rev. P2, 051 Rev. P2, 052 Rev. P2, 053 Rev. P2, 070 Rev. P2, LL412-200-001. Received: 03/03/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 2 - The permission hereby granted shall be for a limited period expiring 24 months from the date of this permission when the use shall cease, the structure removed and the land restored to its previous condition.

Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for a marketing suite shall not be carried on outside the following times unless otherwise as agreed in writing by the LPA: Monday to Fridays 10am-6pm and Saturdays 10am-4pm.
description: Retrospective application to retain an existing marketing suite for a further temporary period of twenty four months.
